hero.title: Hi, I'm Uriel!
hero.des0: Software Developer with over 3 years of experience working in the tech industry. Graduated B.S. in Computer Science with Honors.
hero.des1: Mainly focused on mobile and embedded software applications.
hero.des2: With extensive experience in Android/iOS native applications, Android TVs, Android/Flash/QT Printers.
hero.des3: My technology stack includes C, C++, Java, Kotlin, Swift, and more.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Some of the top projects I have worked on, used by millions of people all over the globe.

laddy.subtitle: Industry leading provider of data broadcasting services
laddy.description: On-going project. AndroidTV application using the latest ATSC 3.0 standard

nuopen.subtitle: Online Tutorial Service
nuopen.description: NativeCamp offers English as Second Language (ESL) tutorial services online. It is the #1 installed app for Online ESL Lessons in the App and Play Store

railwayz.subtitle: Global leader in imaging solutions
railwayz.description: Focused on embedded development of GUI panels for Lexmark printers running on QT, Android, Flash, and more.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I have a diverse set of technical skills. These are some of the tools I am most familiar with and work with every day.
